wasavi_desc.message: vi editor for any web page.

option_exrc_desc.message: Enter initialization commands for wasavi. These commands will be executed every time wasavi is launched. You can write any ex commands you like.

option_quick_activation_off.message: when a key combination is entered

option_site_overrides_tips.message:
* Put any URL to control wasavi behavior for each site.
* A line starting with [c];[/c] or [c]#[/c] is treated as comment.
* Each valid line consists of three components delimited by space: URL, CSS-selector, action.
* You can use wildcard [c]*[/c] and [c]?[/c] in URL.
* action is [c]block[/c] or [c]:set[/c] command of wasavi. block action prevents wasavi from launch. set command will be evaluated after exrc.

option_target_elements_desc.message:
* Format is <(modifier-)* key>,...
For example, <c-enter>, <insert> means "Launch wasavi when ctrl+enter or insert is pressed."
* Following keys can be used:
[c]backspace[/c] [c]bs[/c] [c]tab[/c] [c]enter[/c] [c]return[/c] [c]ret[/c] [c]pageup[/c] [c]pagedown[/c] [c]end[/c] [c]home[/c] [c]left[/c] [c]up[/c] [c]right[/c] [c]down[/c] [c]insert[/c] [c]ins[/c] [c]delete[/c] [c]del[/c] [c],[/c] [c]comma[/c] [c].[/c] [c]dot[/c] [c]period[/c] [c]/[/c] [c]slash[/c] [c]\[[/c] [c]\\[/c] [c]backslash[/c] [c]\][/c]
[c]f1[/c] to [c]f12[/c], [c]a[/c] to [c]z[/c], [c]0[/c] to [c]9[/c]
* Following keys can be used as modifier: [c]s[/c] (for SHIFT), [c]c[/c] (for CTRL).
* If text field is left empty default shortcut <c-enter>, <insert> is used.

option_open_button_desc.message: Open Options Page with a new tab
